title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Stepova Novoselivka, Kotlyarivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation con...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Stepova Novoselivka, Kotlyarivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Borova of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
